headline: PARADISE AWAITS: ROYAL CARIBBEAN REDEFINES THE ULTIMATE BEACH DAY WITH ROYAL BEACH CLUB PARADISE ISLAND
summary: Royal Caribbean is bringing the ultimate beach day to The Bahamas. Opening in December 2025, Royal Beach Club Paradise Island* will be the first in the vacation brand's Royal Beach Club Collection, combining the striking beaches of Paradise Island and Royal Caribbean's signature experiences to create an all-inclusive beach day – and with the vibrant Bahamian spirit and culture at the heart of it all. From pristine beaches, pools for every vibe and the world's largest swim-up bar to island-style

headline: Royal Caribbean Rewards Shareholders With 38% Dividend Hike
summary: RCL boosts shareholder returns with a 38% dividend hike, reinforcing its commitment to enhancing returns.

raw.headline: Royal Caribbean Rewards Shareholders With 38% Dividend Hike
raw.summary: RCL boosts shareholder returns with a 38% dividend hike, reinforcing its commitment to enhancing returns.

headline: Royal Caribbean raises quarterly dividend 38% to 55c per share
summary: The Board of Directors of Royal Caribbean (RCL) Cruises declared a quarterly dividend of 55c per common share payable on January 13, 2025 to shareholders of record at the close of business on December 27, 2024. This increase reflects the company’s continuing efforts to enhance shareholder returns. Published first on TheFly – the ultimate source for real-time, market-moving breaking financial news.
